fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Single market, Public Health, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
The implementation of the new IORP Directive (pension funds directive); 
Legislative proposal for a new Pan European Personal Pension Product (PEPP) 
EIOPA's consultations about the creation of a new EU legal framework for a pan-European DC occupational DC pension 
Capital Markets Union (CMU) implementation
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Cross Border Benefits Alliance - Europe (CBBA-Europe) is a new Brussels based AISBL aiming to promote the creation of cross border employee benefits in Europe (including cross border/pan-European pension funds, healthcare plans, unemployment benefits programs, etc.).
relevant_communication:
The launch event of CBBA-Europe will be held the 6th of December in Brussels. 
DG Fisma, President of EIOPA will be among the speakers. 
The next project will be a joint paper on the EC proposal for the creation of a Pan European Personal Pension Product, and a reaction to the EIOPA's reflection paper on a EU legal framework for a pan-European occupational DC pension.
